channel.title: Need to Downgrade to Moparcraft version? Look here! Auto Downgrader!
channel.description:
http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/800346-tool-mcnostalgia-201/
Just thought I'd share with you guys, extremely simple just type in the number you want and it will downgrade!
Great for downgrading to server version.

item.title: Need to Downgrade to Moparcraft version? Look here! Auto Downgrader!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:7, topic:423195”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=525846.msg3830825#msg3830825 date=1322544202]

http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,524930.0.html

BUT THAT DOES NOT DO IT AUTOMATICALLY BRO THATS LIKE CAVEMAN.
[/quote]
Actually it does if you check down in the last couple sentences of the post I have a link that says, “Click Here” for bla bla automatic downgrader.

[quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=524930.msg3821096#msg3821096 date=1321768347]
[size=12pt]For all Alpha Jars[/size]
Here is a link to a program that allows you to revert back to any Minecraft Stage possible without the need of a jar file.
Very simple and safe program made by another safe member of the Minecraft community.
[/quote][/quote]

But its now called mcnostalgia

Read full topic
item.source: Need to Downgrade to Moparcraft version? Look here! Auto Downgrader!

item.title: Need to Downgrade to Moparcraft version? Look here! Auto Downgrader!
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:5, topic:423195”][quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=525846.msg3830718#msg3830718 date=1322536275]
http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,524930.0.html
[/quote]
BUT THAT DOES NOT DO IT AUTOMATICALLY BRO THATS LIKE CAVEMAN.[/quote]
Actually it does if you check down in the last couple sentences of the post I have a link that says, “Click Here” for bla bla automatic downgrader.

[quote=“Acorn_, post:1, topic:422260”][size=12pt]For all Alpha Jars[/size]
Here is a link to a program that allows you to revert back to any Minecraft Stage possible without the need of a jar file.
Very simple and safe program made by another safe member of the Minecraft community.[/quote]

Read full topic
